original_title: Journey of Light: The Search for God in the Holy Land
overview: This inspirational documentary chronicles the experiences of five young Catholics as they travel to the heart of the Holy Land to embark on a journey of faith and spiritual enlightenment. The film was produced through the cooperative efforts of the Israeli government, the Palestinian community and Christian leaders, and with the assistance of Michel Sabbah, the Latin Patriarch of Jerusalem.
title: Journey of Light: The Search for God in the Holy Land
